name: Stolen Treasures
description:
This free one shot is set in Wales at the foot of Mount Snowdon. The party have travelled there after hearing that a family have had some serious trouble with some local fairies. The fey have stolen away a child and the family are offering money to any who can help them retrieve their son.

Content Warning - child abduction

There is also a podcast of a group of players doing a playthrough of this adventure if you would like to enjoy that. It can be found here https://anchor.fm/fey-earth/episodes/Stolen-Treasures-e1fu1qr
